title: Post-Apocalyptic Fiction Pack - 7 Books to End the World (ePUB)
description:
A pack of seven great post-apocalyptic novels, novellas, and short story collections. Not comprehensive, but instead carefully selected to provide hours of high-quality enjoyment! All books in ePUB format.

A Stranger North - Henry J. Olsen
Emergence - David R. Palmer
I Am Legend - Robert Matheson
The Hunger Games - Suzanne Collins
The Old Man And The Wasteland - Nick Cole
The Stand - Stephen King
Wastelands - John Joseph Adams
